interfaces

Interface IQuestionnaire

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Questionnaire

    public interface IQuestionnaire
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RMI interface to allow clients retrieve questions and submit answers to the database
    Author:
    Chamodya Wimansha

    • Method Summary
